text:
[DiGi WR21/31 Modem Basics]
DiGi WR21/31 Modem Basics
S ample TextHeadline
06/03/2022
ALSOENERGY INC - 5400 AIRPORT BLVD STE 100 - BOULDER, CO 80301 - WWW.ALSOENERGY.COM - 866-303-5668 - v1

AI caption: **Type of image:** Logo
**Main components:** The logo consists of the text "AlsoEnergy" in a stylized, blue font.
**Technical details:** Text: AlsoEnergy. Color: Blue.

AI caption: **Type of image:** Photo
**Main components:** The image shows a high-voltage transmission tower and several wind turbines in a field. The power lines extend from the tower.
**Technical details:** High-voltage transmission tower, wind turbines, power lines, Locus Energy, skytron.

[DiGi WR21/31 Modem Basics]
Outline
In this document you will find screenshots outlining how to find common settings and other
information in a DiGi WR21/31 modem.
Lan Settings
ALSOENERGY INC - 5400 AIRPORT BLVD STE 100 - BOULDER, CO 80301 - WWW.ALSOENERGY.COM - 866-303-5668 - v1

AI caption: **Type of image:** Logo
**Main components:** The logo consists of the text "AlsoEnergy" in a stylized, italicized font.
**Technical details:** Text: AlsoEnergy. The text is in blue.

AI caption: **Type of image:** Screenshot

**Main components:** Network configuration panel for a Digi Transport WR31 router, showing Ethernet interface settings. The panel allows configuration of IP address, subnet mask, gateway, and DNS servers.

**Technical details:**
*   Title: TRANSPORT WR31 (SN: 745647) CONFIGURATION AND MANAGEMENT
*   Navigation: Configuration - Network > Interfaces > Ethernet > ETH 0
*   Network menu: Network, Alarms, System, Remote Management, Security, Telemetry, Applications, Basic, Python, Management, Network Status, Connections, Telemetry, Event Log, Analyser, Top Talkers, Administration, System Information, File Management, X.509 Certificate Management
*   Interface settings: ETH 0, Description, IP Address: 192.168.2.1, Mask: 255.255.255.0, Gateway, DNS Server, Secondary DNS Server
*   Buttons: Apply
*   Text: Configuration successfully applied. Click here to save configuration.

AI caption: **Type of image:** Screenshot of a web interface.
**Main components:** Configuration settings for a Digi Transport WR31 router, including options for saving configuration and firewall settings.
**Technical details:**
*   Device: TRANSPORT WR31 (SN: 745647)
*   User: admin
*   Navigation: Configuration - Network > IP Routing/Forwarding > IP Port Forwarding/Static NAT Mappings
*   Configuration options: Save current configuration to Config 0 (power up), Save All
*   Save All includes: Save the current configuration to config 0, Save the current firewall, Save all sregisters on all ports to profile 0, Save all PAD parameters on all PADs to profile 0
*   Menu items: Home, Wizards, Configuration, Network, Alarms, System, Remote Management, Security, Telemetry

[DiGi WR21/31 Modem Basics]
How to arp -a (AKA LAN IP/MAC Table)
How to Ping
ALSOENERGY INC - 5400 AIRPORT BLVD STE 100 - BOULDER, CO 80301 - WWW.ALSOENERGY.COM - 866-303-5668 - v1

AI caption: **Type of image:** Logo
**Main components:** The logo consists of the text "AlsoEnergy" in blue.
**Technical details:** Text: AlsoEnergy

AI caption: **Type of image:** Screenshot

**Main components:** This image shows a web interface for configuring a Digi Transport WR31 device. It displays the "Execute a command" section, where the user can enter and run commands, and view the results.

**Technical details:**
*   Device: TRANSPORT WR31 (SN: 745647)
*   Command Input: `arp -a`
*   Command Result: ARP Cache Size: 100 entries, old entries reused:0 no arp matches: 324
*   ETH 0: IP Address: 192.168.2.51, Physical Address: 00-1e-c6-05-0b-8e, Expiry: 251, Retries: 3, State: found
*   Menu Items: Home, Wizards, Configuration, Network, Alarms, System, Remote Management, Security, Telemetry, Applications, Basic, Python, Management, Network Status, Connections, Telemetry, Event Log, Analyser, Top Talkers, Administration, System Information, File Management, X.509 Certificate Management, Backup/Restore, Update Firmware, Factory Default Settings, Execute a command, Save configuration, Reboot
*   User: admin

AI caption: **Type of image:** Screenshot of a web interface.
**Main components:** The image shows the "Execute a command" interface for a Digi Transport WR31 router. It displays the command input field, execute button, and the command result of a ping operation.
**Technical details:**
*   Device: TRANSPORT WR31 (SN: 745647)
*   Command: ping 192.168.2.51
*   Ping Statistics: Sent: 1, Received: 1, Success: 100%, Average RTT: 0.00 seconds
*   Interface: ETH 0
*   Menu items: Home, Wizards, Configuration, Network, Alarms, System, Remote Management, Security, Telemetry, Applications, Basic, Python, Management, Network Status, Connections, Telemetry, Event Log, Analyser, Top Talkers, Administration, System Information, File Management, X.509 Certificate Management, Backup/Restore, Update Firmware, Factory Default Settings, Execute a command, Save configuration, Reboot
*   Interface elements: Execute a command [1], Command input [2], Execute button [3]

How to Create Port Forwards
Signal Strength/Quality
ALSOENERGY INC - 5400 AIRPORT BLVD STE 100 - BOULDER, CO 80301 - WWW.ALSOENERGY.COM - 866-303-5668 - v1

AI caption: **Type of image:** Logo
**Main components:** The logo consists of the text "AlsoEnergy" in a stylized, blue font.
**Technical details:** Text: "AlsoEnergy"

AI caption: **Type of image:** Screenshot of a web-based network configuration interface.
**Main components:** Navigation menu, IP routing/forwarding settings, and a table for configuring port forwarding/static NAT mappings.
**Technical details:**
- Title: TRANSPORT WR31 (SN: 745647) CONFIGURATION AND MANAGEMENT
- Navigation: Configuration - Network > IP Routing/Forwarding > IP Port Forwarding/Static NAT Mappings
- Menu items: Interfaces, DHCP Server, Network Services, DNS Servers, Dynamic DNS, IP Routing, Static Routes, RIP, OSPF, BGP
- Table columns: External Min Port, External Max Port, Forward to Internal IP Address, Forward to Internal Port
- Table entries:
  - 1021, 1021, 192.168.2.51, 80
  - 4361, 4361, 192.168.2.161, 443
- Buttons: Apply, Delete, Add
- Text: "Configuration successfully applied. Click here to save configuration."
- User: admin

AI caption: **Type of image:** Screenshot of a web interface.
**Main components:** Configuration settings for a Digi Transport WR31 router, including options for saving the current configuration, firewall settings, sregisters, and PAD parameters.
**Technical details:**
*   Device: TRANSPORT WR31 (SN: 745647)
*   User: admin
*   Navigation: Configuration - Network > IP Routing/Forwarding > IP Port Forwarding/Static NAT Mappings
*   Configuration options: Save current configuration to Config 0 (power up), Save All
*   Save All includes: Save the current configuration to config 0, Save the current firewall, Save all sregisters on all ports to profile 0, Save all PAD parameters on all PADs to profile 0

AI caption: **Type of image:** Screenshot of a configuration and management interface.
**Main components:** System information, LED status, device cloud status, interface status, cellular module information, and GPIO status.
**Technical details:**
*   **Title:** TRANSPORT WR31 (SN: 745647) CONFIGURATION AND MANAGEMENT
*   **System:** Model: TransPort WR31, Part Number: WR31-L52A-DE1-TB, Serial Number: 745647, FW Version: 7.0.3.5, Boot Version: 7.66u, CPU Utilization: 12%, Temperature: 43°C (CPU), 36°C (Internal)
*   **LEDS:** Power, Service, WWAN, Signal 1, Signal 2, Signal 3
*   **Device Cloud:** Server: my.devicecloud.com, Status: Disabled, Device ID: 00000000-00000000-00042DFF-FF0B60AF
*   **Interfaces:** Ethernet 0, Ethernet 1, Cellular
*   **Cellular:** Module: MC7354, SIM: Detected (using SIM 1), Signal Strength: Fair (-109 dBm), Signal Quality: Excellent (-8 dB), IP address: 10.0.3.187, DNS Server: 166.216.138.41, Data Received: 260.21 KB, Data Sent: 604.20 KB
*   **GPIO:** Analog Mode: Current, Analog Value: 0.0231 mA, Digital 0 Input: HIGH (Inactive), Digital 0 Output: OFF, Digital 0 Pullup: ON, Digital 1 Input: HIGH (Inactive), Digital 1 Output: OFF, Digital 1 Pullup: ON

AI caption: **Type of image:** Screenshot

**Main components:** This image shows the "Mobile" section of a device configuration interface, displaying mobile connection status, statistics, and information. It includes details about signal strength, IP addresses, and module status.

**Technical details:**
*   Device: TRANSPORT WR31 (SN: 745647)
*   Mobile Connection: Registration Status, Signal Strength (-109 dBm), Signal Quality (-8 dB), Connection type: NDIS
*   Mobile Statistics: IP Address: 10.0.3.187, Primary DNS Address: 166.216.138.41, Secondary DNS Address: 166.216.138.42, Data Received: 233.89 KB, Data Sent: 513.56 KB
*   Mobile Information: Last Module Status Poll: 3 Jun 2022 15:34:22, SIM status: Ready (PIN checking disabled), Signal strength: -80 dBm, Radio technology: LTE, Signal quality (LTE): RSSI -80 dBm, RSRP -109 dBm, RSRQ -8 dB, SINR 5.6 dB, Radio band: E-UTRA Operating Band 4, Channel: 2225, Manufacturer: Sierra Wireless, Incorporated, Model: MC7354
*   Identifiers: IMEI: 353968092052530, ESN: 8075E3CB, MEID: 35396809205253, IMSI: 310410170651382, MDN: 15334536375, ICCID: 89014104271706513824

[DiGi WR21/31 Modem Basics]
APN Settings
ALSOENERGY INC - 5400 AIRPORT BLVD STE 100 - BOULDER, CO 80301 - WWW.ALSOENERGY.COM - 866-303-5668 - v1

AI caption: **Type of image:** Logo
**Main components:** The logo consists of the text "AlsoEnergy" in a stylized font.
**Technical details:** Text: AlsoEnergy. The text is in blue.

AI caption: **Type of image:** Screenshot of a configuration interface.
**Main components:** This image shows the mobile network configuration settings for a Digi Transport WR31 router. It includes settings for mobile service provider, connection, and network.
**Technical details:**
*   **Device:** TRANSPORT WR31 (SN: 745647)
*   **Navigation:** Configuration - Network > Interfaces > Mobile
*   **SIM:** 1 (PPP 1), IMSI: 310410170651382
*   **Mobile Service Provider Settings:** Service Plan / APN: 14112.mcs
*   **APN Settings:** Select APN automatically, Use backup APN, Retry the main APN after 0 minutes
*   **Security:** SIM PIN, Username, Password
*   **Mobile Network Settings:** Enable NAT on this interface, IP address, IP address and Port, Enable IPsec on this interface, Enable the firewall on this interface
*   **Buttons:** Apply, Save configuration

AI caption: **Type of image:** Screenshot of a web interface.
**Main components:** Configuration settings for a Digi Transport WR31 router, including options to save the current configuration, firewall settings, sregisters, and PAD parameters.
**Technical details:**
*   Device: TRANSPORT WR31 (SN: 745647)
*   User: admin
*   Navigation Path: Configuration - Network > IP Routing/Forwarding > IP Port Forwarding/Static NAT Mappings
*   Configuration Options: Save current configuration to Config 0 (power up), Save All
*   Save All includes: Save the current configuration to config 0, Save the current firewall, Save all sregisters on all ports to profile 0, Save all PAD parameters on all PADs to profile 0
*   Menu items: Home, Wizards, Configuration, Network, Alarms, System, Remote Management, Security, Telemetry
